title: CoNi-MPC: Cooperative Non-inertial Frame Based Model Predictive Control
excerpt: This work presents a new UAV control method for cooperative multi-robot systems, focusing on leader-following, landing on moving bases, and relative motion tasks. Unlike traditional approaches, it operates directly in the target frame without motion assumptions.

title: Global-State-Free Obstacle Avoidance for Quadrotor Control in Air-Ground Cooperation
excerpt: This work presents CoNi-OA, an obstacle-avoidance add-on to CoNi-MPC that lets a UAV cooperate with a UGV without global state estimation. A single raw LiDAR frame is converted into a modulation matrix that tweaks the quadrotor's velocity, producing collision-free trajectories inside the UGV's non-inertial frame in < 5 ms.
